title: Ticket #2772: Macro in node job log file name should be fatal error
description:
Until we actually get things to work with macros in log file names for DAG node jobs, I think finding such a macro should be a fatal error, instead of just a warning, because it seems to goof up the DAG execution in a non-obvious way.

Note that to make this work properly, the low-level multi-log-file code that looks for the log file name in a submit file will probably have to differentiate between not finding a log file name at all (okay) and finding a malformed log file name (not okay).
remarks:
2012-Oct-04 14:25:45 by wenger:
This is pretty much no longer an issue because of #2807 being done. I'm going to leave it unresolved for now, but move it down to priority 5. I can probably be abandoned once the new "one log file" feature is widely used.
